attributes.action: ban non-native speakers of English to teach English language at university level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enduring a lecture listening to an Indian woman talking about phonetics seems wrong when paying £3070 for an education, especially when they can't pronounce half the phonemes. Understanding that this may seem as a racist act, assuring one that this is far from that... Having an English, English tutor seems alot more logical. We need to stop this for students sakes, and for the future of our native language.
